docs.snippet: All Times EDTSaturday, March 22AUTO RACING12:30 p.m....

CC Sabathia pitched seven sharp innings but Derek Jeter remained in a funk at the plate, going hitless in three at-bats during the New York Yankees' 4-0 victory Friday night over the Pittsburgh Pirates....
docs.lead_paragraph: CC Sabathia pitched seven sharp innings but Derek Jeter remained in a funk at the plate, going hitless in three at-bats during the New York Yankees' 4-0 victory Friday night over the Pittsburgh Pirates.

headline.main: Sabathia Sharp, Jeter Hitless as Yanks Top Pirates

docs.snippet: The Los Angeles Dodgers and Arizona Diamondbacks have done the public relations work, petted the kangaroos and visited the tourist sites but it will be all business when opening day goes Down Under on Saturday....

docs.snippet: So-called self-defense groups were ordered to disarm by Friday, the same day Ukraine is scheduled to sign the political articles of an association agreement with the European Union....
docs.lead_paragraph: So-called self-defense groups were ordered to disarm by Friday, the same day Ukraine is scheduled to sign the political articles of an association agreement with the European Union.
docs.abstract: Ukraine's interim government sets deadline of March 21 for turning in illegal firearms carried by so-called defense groups in Independence Square; disarmament is part of effort to stabilize Ukraine and extend its authority, as well as central requirement for European Union to begin disbursing financial aid.

headline.main: Ukraine Sets Deadline for Militias to Surrender Illegal Guns
headline.print_headline: Deadline Is Set for Militias in Uprising to Surrender Their Illegal Guns

docs.snippet: At 57, the reporter Bruce Weber decided to ride a bike from Oregon to New York, a trip similar to one he had made nearly 20 years before....
docs.lead_paragraph: At 57, the reporter Bruce Weber decided to ride a bike from Oregon to New York, a trip similar to one he had made nearly 20 years before.
docs.abstract: Liesl Schillinger reviews book Life Is a Wheel: Love, Death, Etc, and a Bike Ride Across America by Bruce Weber.

headline.seo: In ‘Life Is a Wheel,’ Bruce Weber Bikes Across America
